In general, Britain or United Kingdom avoids falling into awkward moments- he is afraid to say something and end up offending somebody or getting into a misunderstanding. Therefore, he doesn’t like to start conversations with countries he meets for the first time, and his conversations are usually short and general. His sense of Humor varies; oftentimes they are fond of irony, dark Humor, and sarcasm, but he can be shown to appreciate different forms of comedy as well.
